message: Found one posted by @balpha that transforms the time ago text into a perma link to that post, modified it slightly so it works with mew appearing posts too and volia!
pastebin.ca
It's alright, I got it, needed some spaces the compressor took out :)
Should work fine now

javascript: void $("#message-list").delegate("li.message:not(.perm)", "mouseenter", function(){var a=$(this).addClass("perm");a.find("abbr.timeago").wrap("<a/>").parent().css("text-decoration","none").attr("href",$("#recent-topics .active a").attr("href")+a.attr("id").replace("message-",""))})
Here we go: https://gist.github.com/824729
@mal can you do us a favor and create a gist with those bookmarklets? The questions for linkify/remove lines come up all the time and it would be nice to just spit out a gist URL in that case.
javascript: void !function(a){var b=$("<style>");$("head").append(b);for(x in a)a[x].href===null&&a[x].insertRule("#message-list li { border: 0 }",0)}(document.styleSheets)
At the suggestion of @jukkalaurila , one to remove the lines between posts
Cool! Me like.
Can do
The second one can be done with greasemonkey or similar, the first actually uses the jQuery stuff on the page already, so it may be more of a challenge
@balpha Nice one, I'll try to put together a UserScript
Great, thanks! Now how do I install there permanently? userscripts.org something?
btw typo: bookmarkets vs. bookmarkLets
@eik3 Fixed typo (on github at least), thanks
jQuery in greasemonkey isn't that hard; e.g. see the with_jquery() function on top of http://userscripts.org/scripts/review/71948
@mal nice!
Added a userscript to the gist: https://gist.github.com/824729
Updated to include automatic resizing of the input area when you're entering more than a single line, now you can see what you're typing!
